select , from school s left join organization o on s.orgid=o.id
orgid=#{orgid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from school s where xxmc=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select xxmc from school where orgid in
#{item}
select * from school s where orgid in (select id from organization where org_type='2' and parent_id = #{orgid})
select * from school s where orgid in (select id from organization where org_type='2' and locate(#{orgId},parent_ids))
select xxmc from school where orgid=#{orgId}

select s.id, xxdm, xxmc, xxywmc, xxdz, xxyzbm, xzqhm, jxny, xqr, xxbxlxm, xxjbzm, xxzgbmm, fddbrh, frzsh, xzgh, xzxm, dwfzrh, zzjgm, lxdh, czdh, dzxx, zydz, xxbbm, sszgdwm, szdcxlxm, szdjjsxm, szdmzsx, xxxz,dxxz, xxrxnl, czxz, czrxnl, gzxz, zjxyym, fjxyym, zsbj, xxsx, orgid, from school s left join organization o on s.orgid=o.id where s.orgid=#{orgid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select xxmc,zydz from school where orgid in (select id from organization where org_type='2' and locate(#{code},code)=1)
